item.title: Add Redirect.ing to Miscellaneous
item.description: https://redirect.ing/ - Fast & secure domain forwarding without managing servers or SSL certificates. Free plan includes 10 hostnames and 100,000 requests per month.

item.title: Remove visualime.com from the Visitor Session Recording List
Remove PageCDN from the list(CDN and Protection)
Remove 4 Broken List from the List- docsapp.io ,www.3dmodelscc0.com, …
Add BrowserCat to developer APIs
item.description: https://www.browsercat.com - Headless browser API for automation, scraping, AI agent web access, image/pdf generation, and more. Free plan with 1k requests per month.

item.title: Removed MeiliSearch from Searches. No longer free
Adding SimpleRestore - a free tool by SimpleBackups.com
item.description:
https://simplebackups.com/) — Backup automation service for servers and databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB) stored directly into cloud storage providers (AWS, DigitalOcean, and Backblaze - Backup automation service for servers and databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB) stored directly into cloud storage providers (AWS, DigitalOcean, and Backblaze). Provides a free plan for 1 backup.
https://simplerestore.io - Hassle-free MySQL backup restoration. Restore MySQL backups to any remote database without code or a server.

item.title: Add tapform.com
item.description: https://tapform.com/ - Includes unlimited forms, unlimited fields, and unlimited submissions for free. Forms can either be displayed in a standard or a chat format.
